name: Sakura
description:
[School Assignment i had to make on my own: student at Luca School of Arts (Genk)]

Sakura is a puzzle game i made about a old japanese man, who is trying to find his long lost family coin.  To do this he has to travel across moving rocks, that form a path to the coin. Are you ready for this adventure?

There might be updates later on.

if you have any questions, feel free to contact me Saffieraportillo@gmail.com

Enjoy the game!
